level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:
"Attorney General" means the Attorney General for the District of Columbia.
"CMPA" means Chapter 6 of Title 1, [ยง 1-601.01 et seq.].
"Department" means the Department of Health Care Finance established by ยง 7-771.02.
"Department CFO" means the Chief Financial Officer for the Department of Health Care Finance.
"District CFO" means the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.
"PPA" means Unit A of Chapter 3 of Title 2, [ยง 2-301.01 et seq.)].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-109
level.text: Law 17-109, the "Department of Health Care Finance Establishment Act of 2007", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-76 which was referred to the Committee on Health. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 6, 2007, and December 11, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-227 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-109 became effective on February 27, 2008.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 7090 of D.C. Law 17-219 repealed section 13 of D.C. Law 17-109.
